trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> object on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control is owner-drawn or system-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> in un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> è creato dal proprietario o dal sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare i membri di questa enumerazione per impostare il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Style property determines the way in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di stile determina il modo in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> verrà visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects can display simple text or be owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> gli oggetti possono visualizzare testo semplice o essere disegnato dal proprietario.

trans-unit.source: Owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects support displaying images or a different font from the rest of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, while system-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are used to display only text (or text and an icon if an icon is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).
trans-unit.target: Proprietario <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> oggetti supportano la visualizzazione di immagini o un carattere diverso dal resto del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> oggetti in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controllo, mentre dal sistema <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> gli oggetti vengono utilizzati per visualizzare solo testo (o testo e un'icona se un'icona specificato nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).

trans-unit.source: To perform the owner-draw operations on an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire le operazioni di disegno personalizzato in un proprietario <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> evento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> (classe), il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumerazione e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following codein a form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire l'esempio, incollare il codice riportato di seguito in un form.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il `InitializeStatusBarPanels` metodo nel costruttore del form o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> il metodo di gestione degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is drawn by the owner.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> displays text in the standard font.
trans-unit.target: Nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> il testo è visualizzato con il tipo di carattere standard.
